answers.answer: I doubt there is anything wrong with you at all--I think you for some reason are just paying extra close (too close) attention to your skin.  All injuries leave red marks, in everybody.  Everyone has moles, and many people have red spots of one sort or another.  The question is why you are looking at yourself do hard.My advice is to see a skin doctor, who can tell you in person what I've been telling you from a distance about your moles and marks.  That ought to reassure you.  Then you can worry (and look) less.Best.Dr. Rockoff

hi, i have a problem with blackheads, they're on my nose, cheeks, chin, sometimes forehead, i dont have a problem with red puzzy pimples, it is just blackheads and enlarged pores. ive been to the dermotalogist they tried to remove all the blackheads and gave some medication.  My skin cleared up for a little while but eventually went back to its normal way.Im very insecure about my skin because of this i try not to get to close to people physically because i dont want them to see my blackheadsmayb you can suggest some treatment for me thank you

I have a small bump in the crack of my butt, right where the crack and back meet, it gets bigger and painfull sometimes and then it pops and a puss and blood like substance comes out. It drains fluids every day but does not always hurt. I have had this for about one year now but have no health insurance so i havent seen a doctor about it. Please help.

question: Ive notice a couple changes in my skin the past couple of months that concern me.  First is the easiness of scarring to my skin. sometimes just the smallest cust leaves a scar. ive got one on my arm from a paper cut.  Even bandaids leave marks.  The other is the appearance of many new moles on my body, all small but one seems to appear every week. I still dont have that many probably a total of 15 at max.  The other is the appearance of red bumps on my body which are also pretty small.  The larger they are the more painful, but there still not very big and there not pimples. Could you please address these issues for me or at least give me some possibilities.  Ive taken blood tests and dont have any stds, diabetes, thyroid problems. just high blood pressure.
title: skin problems
